en_query: Summarize the whole meeting
fr_query: Rsumer toute la runion
en_summary: The meeting was about a computer based navigation system that will be used to conduct linguistic experiments on navigational terminology and intentionality, and it was simultaneously being recorded for another project. The navigational interface allows people to walk around a place and perform basic actions, like entering a building. Its goal is to understand what people intend to do based on granular linguistic features. The experimental set up is that people talk to a human assistant who controls the program in an attempt to complete a certain task. To study intentionality, the team will determine important linguistic features and use a Bayes model to see if they can predict the intention based on utterances.
fr_summary: La runion portait sur un systme de navigation informatis qui sera utilis pour mener des expriences linguistiques sur la terminologie et l'intentionnalit de la navigation, et elle tait simultanment enregistre pour un autre projet. L'interface de navigation permet aux utilisateurs de se dplacer dans un lieu et d'effectuer des actions de base, comme entrer dans un btiment. Son objectif est de comprendre ce que les gens ont l'intention de faire sur la base de caractristiques linguistiques granulaires. La configuration exprimentale est que les gens parlent  un assistant humain qui contrle le programme pour tenter d'accomplir une certaine tche. Pour tudier l'intentionnalit, l'quipe dterminera les caractristiques linguistiques importantes et utilisera un modle de Bayes pour voir si elle peut prdire l'intention en fonction des noncs.

en_query: Summarize the discussion on future directions

en_summary: The team discussed testing a multi-band approach that is more resistance to noise. The professor thought that it many not be a bad idea to put together several MLP's to improve performance. The team also thought that there might be problems with the pronunciation models.

L'quipe a galement pens qu'il pourrait y avoir des problmes avec les modles de prononciation.

en_query: What was the future of data collection?
fr_query: Quel tait l'avenir de la collecte des donnes ?
en_summary: The group aims to collect over 100 hours of Meeting Recorder data in total. Speaker consent forms are being revised. It was suggested that subjects should sign a new consent form after 10 recording sessions.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about scheduling meetings going forward
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur la planification des runions  l'avenir
en_summary: The team thought that they should not have everyone attend meetings on specific topics. For general catchup meetings like this, they thought it would make sense to alternate every two weeks. The team joked around about having a guys meeting, as one of the groups would not have any female members. They were mainly concerned with collecting more data through their own meeting recordings. Though, many of the meetings they were having for that purpose were shorter than they would have liked.
fr_summary: L'quipe a pens qu'il ne fallait pas que tout le monde assiste  des runions sur des sujets spcifiques. Pour les runions gnrales de rattrapage comme celle-ci, ils ont pens qu'il serait logique d'alterner toutes les deux semaines. L'quipe a plaisant sur le fait d'avoir une runion dhommes, car l'un des groupes n'aurait pas de membres fminins. Ils taient principalement proccups par la collecte de plus de donnes grce  leurs propres enregistrements de runions. Cependant, bon nombre des runions qu'ils avaient  cette fin taient plus courtes qu'ils ne l'auraient souhait.

en_query: What did the group think about Dave leaving?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le groupe du dpart de Dave ?
en_summary: The group needed Dave Johnson to install the some one hundred SUN - Blades that had arrived and would help with storage. But Dave Johnson, the professor informed them, was leaving for ten days. The Professor informed the group that Dave was always busy and the group realized that there was no dedicated person who could help them.
fr_summary: Le groupe avait besoin de Dave Johnson pour installer la centaine de SUN - Blades qui taient arrives et aideraient au stockage. Mais Dave Johnson partait pour dix jours, les a informs le professeur. Le professeur a inform le groupe que Dave tait toujours occup et le groupe s'est rendu compte qu'il n'y avait aucune personne dvoue susceptible de les aider.

en_query: Summarize the discussion on storage disks and computer connections
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur les disques de stockage et les connexions informatiques
en_summary: The participants learned that the storage disks had eventually arrived. They were waiting on the disks to be installed. Grad E volunteered storage space on their own computer for the meantime. The meetings were around 1.5 gigs uncompressed and .5 gigs compressed. So, the group needed substantial space. The professor encouraged the team members to talk to Dave, the person responsible for managing the organization's storage systems, and figure things out.
fr_summary: Les participants ont appris que les disques de stockage taient finalement arrivs. Ils attendaient que les disques soient installs. Le diplm E a offert de l'espace de stockage sur son propre ordinateur pour l'instant. Les runions taient d'environ 1,5 Go non compress et 0,5 Go compress. Le groupe avait donc besoin d'un espace consquent. Le professeur a encourag les membres de l'quipe  parler  Dave, la personne responsable de la gestion des systmes de stockage de l'organisation, et  comprendre les choses.

en_query: What did Grad  D think about the experimental setup of the computer navigation system?
fr_query: Qu'a pens D de la configuration exprimentale du systme de navigation informatique ?
en_summary: Grad D wanted to know if the videos for the navigation system would be recorded from a first person perspective. Grad D was also trying to understand how ambitious the system was. Grad D learned that the goal was to understand how people reacted and talked in such a scenario. Grad D provided some information about potential candidates for the human operator and wizard roles as well.
fr_summary: Diplm D a voulu savoir si les vidos du systme de navigation seraient enregistres du point de vue de la premire personne. Diplm D a galement essay de comprendre  quel point le systme tait ambitieux. Diplm D a appris que le but tait de comprendre comment les gens ragissaient et parlaient dans un tel scnario. Diplm D a galement fourni des informations sur les candidats potentiels pour les rles d'oprateur humain et d'assistant.

en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The participants went over the results of the most recent experiments, discussing future directions to take. Adding more languages was still decreasing model performance. The best network consisted of the TIMIT and noise. The team thought that they should try to reduce their dependence on noise in the data. The Professor outlined how they could continue their experimentation.
fr_summary: Les participants ont pass en revue les rsultats des expriences les plus rcentes, discutant des orientations futures  prendre. L'ajout de plusieurs langues diminuait encore les performances du modle. Le meilleur rseau tait compos du TIMIT et du bruit. L'quipe a pens qu'elle devrait essayer de rduire sa dpendance au bruit dans les donnes. Le professeur a expliqu comment ils pourraient poursuivre leur exprimentation.

en_query: What is the description of the domains in the mental spaces?
fr_query: Quelle est la description des domaines dans les espaces mentaux ?
en_summary: Given the domains currently used (tourist, child language learning), some features, like speaker attitude, are not of equal importance at this stage. On the other hand, it was decided for the inheritance between constructions to be left out for now, as the notation can be rendered more elegant later on.
fr_summary: Compte tenu des domaines actuellement utiliss (tourisme, apprentissage des langues par les enfants), certaines caractristiques, comme l'attitude de lorateur, ne sont pas d'gale importance  ce stade. En revanche, il a t dcid de laisser de ct pour l'instant l'hritage entre constructions, la notation pouvant tre rendue plus lgante par la suite.

fr_query: Qu'a pens le professeur de la planification des runions  l'avenir ?
en_summary: The professor polled the group on how many people would not be interested in meetings on recognition. He thought that they should at least try the smaller meetings and see what happens.
fr_summary: Le professeur a interrog le groupe sur le nombre de personnes qui ne seraient pas intresses par des runions sur la reconnaissance. Il pensait qu'ils devraient au moins essayer les petites runions et voir ce qui se passe.

en_query: What would happen after the demo?
fr_query: Que se passerait-il aprs la dmo ?
en_summary: After the demo, the focus of research can switch towards purely scientific goals, including issues on ontology and execution engines etc. Moreover, a new system will be designed for the project and at least some parts of it should be built.
fr_summary: Aprs la dmo, l'orientation de la recherche peut s'orienter vers des objectifs purement scientifiques, notamment des questions d'ontologie, de moteurs d'excution, etc. De plus, un nouveau systme sera conu pour le projet et au moins certaines parties de celui-ci devront tre construites.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about the results from the experiments
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur les rsultats des expriences
en_summary: Last run of experiments showed that adding more languages was still severely harming model performance. They noted that normalization of any kind has a good effect on the model, whereas MSG does nothing.
fr_summary: La dernire srie d'expriences a montr que l'ajout de plusieurs langues nuisait encore gravement aux performances du modle. Ils ont not que la normalisation de toute sorte a un bon effet sur le modle, alors que MSG ne fait rien.

en_query: What did Grad B think about the experimental setup of the computer navigation system?
fr_query: Que pense B de la configuration exprimentale du systme de navigation informatique ?
en_summary: Grad B explained that the subject of the experiment will first be given texts about a city, so they can familiarize themselves with foreign terms. Then, they will be introduced to a computer navigation system with which they can navigate the city and provided with a set of tasks to complete. Then, the computer system will crash, including the GPS, so the person will not even know where they are, and the human operator will assist them. To find their location, the subject will have to provide visual information to the human operator. Grad B also thought that creating movies of walking would require a lot of technical effort but later claimed that it may be worth it. Grad B clarified that the goal was to see how people communicate in such a scenario.
fr_summary: Diplm B a expliqu que le sujet de l'exprience recevrait d'abord des textes sur une ville, afin qu'il puisse se familiariser avec des termes trangers. Ensuite, ils seront initis  un systme de navigation informatique avec lequel ils pourront naviguer dans la ville et recevront un ensemble de tches  accomplir. Ensuite, le systme informatique plantera, y compris le GPS , de sorte que la personne ne saura mme pas o elle se trouve, et l'oprateur humain l'assistera. Pour trouver leur emplacement, le sujet devra fournir des informations visuelles  l'oprateur humain. Diplm B pensait galement que crer des films de marche ncessiterait beaucoup d'efforts techniques, mais a affirm plus tard que cela en valait la peine. Diplm B a prcis que l'objectif tait de voir comment les gens communiquent dans un tel scnario.

en_query: Whats the current status of recordings and transcriptions?
fr_query: Quel est l'tat actuel des enregistrements et des transcriptions ?
en_summary: Approximately 12-13 hours of Meeting Recorder data have been collected, roughly 45 minutes of which have been transcribed. Additional meetings by other ICSI research groups will be recorded. A suggestion was made that multi-channel data also be collected in cooperation with local media broadcasters, and that such events might be recorded live from ICSI.

en_query: What was the general discussion of the meeting?
fr_query: Quelle tait la discussion gnrale de la runion ?
en_summary: The meeting discussed various topics such as data collection and updates on the German parser. They discussed XML modifications and future thoughts on the ontology. In any case, further to fulfilling the basic requirements (translating the parser and the generator into english), the project is entirely open-ended in terms of focus of research.
fr_summary: La runion a abord divers sujets tels que la collecte de donnes et les mises  jour sur l'analyseur allemand. Ils ont discut des modifications XML et des rflexions futures sur l'ontologie. Dans tous les cas, outre le respect des exigences de base (traduction de l'analyseur et du gnrateur en anglais), le projet est entirement ouvert en termes d'axe de recherche.

en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The meeting began with the team catching up the professor, who had missed the previous meeting. Then, the team moved onto talking about echo cancelling techniques. They were trying to remove the voice of other people from the primary person's microphone. Then, the team discussed how they could improve the performance on the Aurora task by playing around with the model. The team ended the meeting with various comments on different topics.
fr_summary: La runion a commenc avec l'quipe rattrapant le professeur, qui avait manqu la runion prcdente. Ensuite, l'quipe a parl des techniques d'annulation d'cho. Ils essayaient d'effacer la voix d'autres personnes  partir du microphone de la personne principale. Puis, l'quipe a discut de la manire dont elle pourrait amliorer les performances de la tche Aurora en jouant avec le modle. L'quipe a termin la runion avec divers commentaires sur diffrents sujets.

en_query: What were the main discussion points of the meeting?
fr_query: Quels ont t les principaux points de discussion de la runion ?
en_summary: The group discussed topics including a potential collaboration with another ICSI member regarding the analysis of inference structures, efforts by a PhD student  to detect speaker overlap, the current status of recordings and transcriptions, and future efforts to collect meeting data. In addition to weekly meetings by the BMR group, efforts are in progress to record meetings by other ICSI research groups, as well as routine discussions by non-ICSI members.
fr_summary: Le groupe a discut de sujets tels qu'une collaboration potentielle avec un autre membre de l'ICSI concernant l'analyse des structures d'infrence, les efforts d'un tudiant de doctorat pour dtecter le chevauchement des orateurs, l'tat actuel des enregistrements et des transcriptions, et les efforts futurs pour collecter des donnes de runion. En plus des runions hebdomadaires du groupe BMR, des efforts sont en cours pour enregistrer les runions d'autres groupes de recherche de l'ICSI, ainsi que les discussions de routine des non-membres de l'ICSI.

en_query: What was agreed upon on sample transcripts?
fr_query: Qu'a-t-il t convenu sur les exemples de transcriptions ?
en_summary: To save time, the PhD student will only mark the sample of transcribed data for regions of overlapping speech, as opposed to marking all acoustic events. The digits extraction task will be delegated to whomever is working on acoustics for the Meeting Recorder project.
fr_summary: Pour gagner du temps, ltudiant de doctorat marquera uniquement l'chantillon de donnes transcrites pour les rgions de parole qui se chevauchent, au lieu de marquer tous les vnements acoustiques. La tche d'extraction des chiffres sera dlgue  quiconque travaille sur l'acoustique pour le projet d'enregistreur de runion.

professor b: I had another thought just now, which is, uh, remember we were talking before about we were talking in our meeting about, uh, this stuff that some of the other stuff that Avendano did, where they were, um, getting rid of low - energy sections? Um, uh, if you if you did a high - pass filtering, as Hirsch did in late eighties to reduce some of the effects of reverberation, uh, uh, Avendano and Hermansky were arguing that, uh, perhaps one of the reasons for that working was ma may not have even been the filtering so much but the fact that when you filter a an all - positive power spectrum you get some negative values, and you gotta figure out what to do with them if you 're gonna continue treating this as a power spectrum. So, what what Hirsch did was, uh, set them to zero set the negative values to zero. So if you imagine a a waveform that's all positive, which is the time trajectory of energy, um, and, uh, shifting it downwards, and then getting rid of the negative parts, that's essentially throwing away the low - energy things. And it's the low - energy parts of the speech where the reverberation is most audible. You know, you have the reverberation from higher - energy things showing up in So in this case you have some artificially imposed reverberation - like thing. I mean, you 're getting rid of some of the other effects of reverberation, but because you have these non - causal windows, you 're getting these funny things coming in, uh, at n And, um, what if you did? I mean, there's nothing to say that the the processing for this re - synthesis has to be restricted to trying to get it back to the original, according to some equation. I mean, you also could, uh, just try to make it nicer.
grad e: Uh - huh.
professor b: And one of the things you could do is, you could do some sort of VAD - like thing
grad e: Mm - hmm.
professor b: and you actually could take very low - energy sections and set them to some some, uh, very low or or near zero value. I mean, uh, I 'm just saying if in fact it turns out that that these echoes that you 're hearing are, uh 
grad e: Uh - huh.
professor b: or pre - echoes, whichever they are are are, uh, part of what's causing the problem, you actually could get rid of them.
grad e: Uh - huh.
professor b: Be pretty simple. I mean, you do it in a pretty conservative way
grad e: OK.
professor b: so that if you made a mistake you were more likely to keep in an echo than to throw out speech.
grad e: Hmm.
en_query: What did the professor think about echoes and reverberation?
fr_query: Que pense le professeur des chos et de la rverbration ?
en_summary: The professor thought it was possible to reduce the effects of reverberation by removing the low-energy segments. He thought a VAD-like approach would work. This would make it so that the model was more likely to keep an echo than throw out speech.
fr_summary: Le professeur a pens qu'il tait possible de rduire les effets de la rverbration en supprimant les segments  faible nergie. Il a dit qu'une approche de type VAD fonctionnerait. Cela ferait en sorte que le modle tait plus susceptible de garder un cho que de rejeter la parole.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about the experimental setup of the computer navigation system
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur la configuration exprimentale du systme de navigation informatique
en_summary: The computer navigation system will work as follows. The subject of the experiment will familiarize themselves with information about a city. Then, they will be introduced to an advanced navigation system through which they can navigate the city, and they will be given several tasks, like buying stamps. The navigation system will crash, and the subject will be connected to a human operator. Then, the human operator will control the system based on the subject's requests as the subject tries to complete their tasks. Both sides, the assistant and the subject, will be recorded for data collection purposes.
fr_summary: Le systme de navigation informatique fonctionnera comme suit. Le sujet de l'exprience se familiarisera avec des informations sur une ville. Ensuite, ils seront initis  un systme de navigation avanc  travers lequel ils pourront naviguer dans la ville, et ils se verront confier plusieurs tches, comme l'achat de timbres. Le systme de navigation plantera et le sujet sera connect  un oprateur humain. Ensuite, l'oprateur humain contrlera le systme en fonction des demandes du sujet alors que le sujet essaiera d'accomplir ses tches. Les deux parties, l'assistant et le sujet, seront enregistres  des fins de collecte de donnes.

en_query: What was the general discussion?
fr_query: Quelle tait la discussion gnrale ?
en_summary: The group discussed recognition results generated for 20 minutes of close-talking microphone data. Recognition performance was very good, indicating promising results for forced alignment procedures and the ability to analyze other important signal information, e.g. prosody and overlapping speech. It was decided that close-talking data should be downsampled and fed to the SRI recognizer to compare recognition performance, and that data from the far-field microphones should be tested on the recognizer as soon as possible. The group also discussed recording setup and equipment issues.
fr_summary: Le groupe a discut des rsultats de reconnaissance gnrs pour 20 minutes de donnes de microphone  proximit. Les performances de reconnaissance taient trs bonnes, indiquant des rsultats prometteurs pour les procdures d'alignement forc et la capacit d'analyser d'autres informations de signal importantes,par exemple, prosodie et parole superpose. Il a t dcid que les donnes de proximit devraient tre sous-chantillonnes et envoyes au reconnaisseur SRI pour comparer les performances de reconnaissance, et que les donnes des microphones  champ lointain devraient tre testes sur le reconnaisseur ds que possible. Le groupe a galement discut de la configuration de l'enregistrement et des problmes d'quipement.

en_query: What was concluded on semantic specification?
fr_query: Qu'a-t-on conclu sur la spcification smantique ?
en_summary: The revised semantic specification and construction formalism are more stable than the previous versions. In the latter, they find both construction types and meaning types along with formal considerations like verb subcategorization, or the ones a "directed motion" construction would dictate.
fr_summary: La spcification smantique rvise et le formalisme de construction sont plus stables que les versions prcdentes. Dans ce dernier, ils trouvent  la fois des types de construction et des types de sens ainsi que des considrations formelles comme la sous-catgorisation des verbes, ou celles qu'imposerait une construction  mouvement dirig.

en_query: What did Grad F think about intermediate categories?
fr_query: Qua pens Diplm F des catgories intermdiaires ?
en_summary: Grad F informed the team that he was building a system that classified intermediate categories with multi-band techniques. Then, to reduce error for phoneme recognition, the intermediate categories could be added to improve performance. The method could be replicated for large vocabulary tasks like switchboard.
fr_summary: Diplm F a inform l'quipe qu'il construisait un systme qui classait les catgories intermdiaires avec des techniques multi-bandes. Ensuite, pour rduire les erreurs de reconnaissance des phonmes, les catgories intermdiaires pourraient tre ajoutes pour amliorer les performances. La mthode pourrait tre reproduite pour des tches de vocabulaire importantes comme le standard tlphonique.

en_query: What did PhD A think about the results?
fr_query: Qu'a pens Doctorat A des rsultats ?
en_summary: PhD A thought that most of the nets are not that good, except for the multi English. MSG was not bringing as much information as he thought it would. He explained that even when the features were not normalized, the neural network would perform at 90%, as it would with normalization.
fr_summary: Doctorat A a pens que la plupart des rseaux ntaient pas trs bons,  l'exception du multi anglais. MSG n'apportait pas autant d'informations qu'il le pensait. Il a expliqu que mme lorsque les caractristiques n'taient pas normalises, le rseau de neurones fonctionnerait  90 %, comme il le ferait avec la normalisation.

en_query: Summarize the discussion on detecting important linguistic features
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur la dtection des caractristiques linguistiques importantes
en_summary: The team wanted to understand how they could combine different linguistic features to make a more robust recognition model. They were running experiments to figure out what the good features were. The team also entertained the possibility of clustering them, which would add to the robustness.
fr_summary: L'quipe a voulu comprendre comment combiner diffrentes caractristiques linguistiques pour crer un modle de reconnaissance plus robuste. Elle a men des expriences pour dterminer quelles taient les bonnes fonctionnalits. L'quipe a galement envisag la possibilit de les regrouper, ce qui ajouterait  la robustesse.

en_query: What did the professor think about MSG?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le professeur du MSG ?
en_summary: The professor generally liked MSG because of its different temporal properties. Nonetheless, he recognized that it might not be practical to explore it further due to time constraints. At this point, he thought that there were no clear solutions to the challenges they were facing, but there was still plenty to do.
fr_summary: Le professeur a, dans lensemble, bien aim le MSG en raison de ses diffrentes proprits temporelles. Nanmoins, il a reconnu qu'il pourrait ne pas tre pratique de l'explorer davantage en raison de contraintes de temps.  ce stade, il a dit qu'il n'y avait pas de solutions claires aux dfis auxquels ils taient confronts, mais qu'il restait encore beaucoup  faire.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about setting up the recording equipment
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur l'installation de l'quipement d'enregistrement
en_summary: One of the graduate students is working on building the PDA of the future. The idea is to be able to record meetings for personal use and then query them for pertinent information. The data collection will be anonymized to a large extent, but not so much that the meeting does not represent a real scenario. This meeting will be one of the recorded meetings.
fr_summary: L'un des tudiants diplms travaille  la construction du PDA du futur. L'ide est de pouvoir enregistrer des runions pour un usage personnel, puis de les interroger pour obtenir des informations pertinentes. La collecte de donnes sera anonymise dans une large mesure, mais pas tant que la runion ne reprsente pas un scnario rel. Cette runion sera l'une des runions enregistres.

en_query: Summarize the discussion on mean subtraction in SRI
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur la soustraction moyenne dans le SRI
en_summary: The team got an improvement on the SRI system for TI- digits and Meeting Recorder digits but near mic performance worsened. The team explored the reasons for this difference. The professor suggested getting rid of low energy sections. The team also discussed how more nuanced normalization approaches could improve task performance.
fr_summary: L'quipe a obtenu une amlioration du systme SRI pour les chiffres TI et les chiffres de l'enregistreur de runion, mais les performances proches du micro se sont dtriores. L'quipe a explor les raisons de cette diffrence. Le professeur a suggr de se dbarrasser des sections  faible nergie. L'quipe a galement discut de la manire dont des approches de normalisation plus nuances pourraient amliorer les performances des tches.

en_query: What did Professor C think about setting up the recording equipment?

en_summary: Professor C began by asking some questions about the recording procedure and wanted to know what excising utterances from the transcript would look like. Professor C asked several questions to that end but clarified that the source of inquiry was curiosity and nothing more. Additionally, Professor C wanted Grad A to explain to the meeting participants what the experiment was for.

Par ailleurs, Professeur C voulait que Diplm A explique aux participants  la runion  quoi servait l'exprience.

en_query: Summarize what was said about the microphone data
fr_query: Rsumer ce qui a t dit sur les donnes du microphone
en_summary: The group discussed recognition results generated for 20 minutes of close-talking microphone data. Recognition performance was very good, indicating promising results for forced alignment procedures and the ability to analyze other important signal information, e.g. prosody and overlapping speech. It was decided that close-talking data should be downsampled and fed to the SRI recognizer to compare recognition performance, and that data from the far-field microphones should be tested on the recognizer as soon as possible.
fr_summary: Le groupe a discut des rsultats de reconnaissance gnrs pour 20 minutes de donnes de microphones proches. Les performances de reconnaissance taient trs bonnes, indiquant des rsultats prometteurs pour les procdures d'alignement forc et la capacit d'analyser d'autres informations de signal importantes, par exemple, prosodie et parole superpose. Il a t dcid que les donnes de proximit devraient tre sous-chantillonnes et envoyes au reconnaisseur SRI pour comparer les performances de reconnaissance, et que les donnes des microphones  champ lointain devraient tre testes sur le reconnaisseur ds que possible.

en_summary: The professor recounted that the person who worked with positional parameters, Mark Randolph, is at Motorola. He explained that his model consisted of many continuous variables and that heading in that direction would become a research project in and of itself.

en_query: What was the meeting about?
fr_query: De quoi parlait la runion ?
en_summary: The revised semantic specification and construction formalism are more stable than the previous versions. Semantic constraints also come into play. The semantic specification, on the other hand, is split into three levels: "scenario" is a list of schemas and bindings between them, which describes the current event in terms of Source-Path-Goal, Container, etc.; "referent" is about the entities in the discourse and includes grammatical information and pointers to the ontology; "discourse segment" comprises utterance-specific things. Apart from the presentation, JavaBayes can now run through the modified web page of the project.
fr_summary: La spcification smantique rvise et le formalisme de construction sont plus stables que les versions prcdentes. Les contraintes smantiques entrent galement en jeu. La spcification smantique, quant  elle, est divise en trois niveaux :  scenario  est une liste de schmas et de liaisons entre eux, qui dcrit l'vnement en cours en termes de Source-Path-Goal, Container, etc. ;  rfrent  concerne les entits du discours et inclut des informations grammaticales et des pointeurs vers l'ontologie ;  segment de discours  comprend des choses spcifiques  l'nonc. Outre la prsentation, JavaBayes peut dsormais parcourir la page Web modifie du projet.

en_summary: Industrial Designer suggested having a trendy remote control with bright color, red for instance. But Marketing argued that it might add to cost and make it more difficult to design if the cover were to be changed. Industrial Designer also suggested that trendy people or children could draw on the cover to make their own remote control more unique. But again, it was questioned by User Interface who were not sure about whether it would be profitable.

Mais le responsable marketing a fait valoir que cela pourrait augmenter les cots et rendre la conception plus difficile si la couverture devait tre modifie. Le designer industriel a galement suggr aux personnes styls et enfants de dessiner sur la couverture pour rendre leur propre tlcommande plus unique. Mais encore une fois, il a t remis en question par le concepteur de linterface utilisateur qui n'tait pas sr de savoir si cela serait rentable.

en_query: Summarize the presentation and discussion about the technical design.
fr_query: Rsumez la prsentation et la discussion sur la conception technique.
en_summary: Industrial designer introduced the working design including the energy, LED sender, different user interface, and the chipboard with buttons on it. They could put every button under the thumb. Then, the group discussed and decided to have removable fronts, a small centralized LCD screen, and a power button with 10 other setting buttons.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a prsent la conception de travail, y compris l'nergie, l'metteur de LED, une interface utilisateur diffrente et le panneau de particules avec des boutons dessus. Ils pourraient mettre chaque bouton sous le pouce. Ensuite, le groupe a discut et dcid d'avoir des faades amovibles, un petit cran LCD centralis, et un bouton d'alimentation avec 10 autres boutons de rglage.

en_query: What did the group talk about the touch screen under the limitation of the budget?
fr_query: Qu'a dit le groupe sur l'cran tactile sous la limitation du budget ?
en_summary: The group found that if they would use the touch screen as well as the voice recognition technique, the cost would up to 17 euros. On the other hand, in order to guarantee the one hundred percent profit, the price would be more than 30, which would risk losing potential consumers. Provided that they would control the cost within 12.5 euros, they would have to cut off some functions, for example, voice recognition. It was really hard to balance between the popular tastes, the cost and the quality.
fr_summary: Le groupe a constat que s'ils utilisaient l'cran tactile en plus de la technique de reconnaissance vocale, le cot monterait jusqu' 17 euros. Pour garantir un profit  cent pour cent, le prix serait suprieur  30, ce qui risquerait de faire perdre des consommateurs potentiels. Afin de matriser les cots  moins de 12,5 euros, il leur faudrait retirer certaines fonctions, comme par exemple la reconnaissance vocale. C'tait vraiment difficile d'quilibrer entre les gots populaires, le cot et la qualit.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The group mainly talked about the extra deciding of the product at this meeting including the presentation of the prototype assessment, the discussion of the requirements and trends of marketing and the product cost and quotation. Firstly, the Industrial Designer introduced the prototype of the product. It had not only the round basic shape which was made of hard plastics and titanium using different colors, but also the buttons like channel and volumn. Later, the group discussed some details and changes of redesigning the logo, buttons and screens. Next, the Marketing Expert mentioned the exterior of the product, the material attraction, and how easy it was to learn or use the basic functions of the product. Besides, the group discussed some details of the cost of components and made the product cheaper by replacing the titanium by hard plastics with similar color. They finally got an estimate of fourteen point one Euros, which was above the budget. In the end, they discussed the distinction between the product and other devices, and celebrated the completion of the project.
fr_summary: Le groupe a principalement parl de la dcision supplmentaire du produit lors de cette runion, y compris la prsentation de l'valuation du prototype, la discussion des exigences et des tendances du marketing et le cot et le devis du produit. Tout d'abord, le designer industriel a prsent le prototype du produit. Il avait non seulement la forme de base ronde qui tait faite de plastiques durs et de titane utilisant diffrentes couleurs, mais aussi les boutons comme la chane et le volume. Plus tard, le groupe a discut de certains dtails et modifications de la refonte du logo, des boutons et des crans. Ensuite, l'expert en marketing a mentionn l'extrieur du produit, l'attraction matrielle et la facilit d'apprentissage ou d'utilisation des fonctions de base du produit. En outre, le groupe a discut de certains dtails du cot des composants et a rendu le produit moins cher en remplaant le titane par des plastiques durs de couleur similaire. Ils ont finalement obtenu une estimation de 14,10 euros, ce qui tait suprieur au budget.  la fin, ils ont discut de la distinction entre le produit et les autres appareils et ont clbr l'achvement du projet.

en_query: What did the group discuss about speech recognition?

en_summary: Since the marketing and the user interface designer mentioned speech recognition in their previous presentations, the industrial designer suggested putting a simple speech recogniser on the digital signal processing chip and training the speech recogniser for particular users. However, the user interface designer concerned that it would be too complex. Then the industrial designer argued that even some simple mobile devices could have these voice dialers so it wouldn't be so sophisticated, and the marketing also said the product would be good to sell with the speech recogniser.

en_query: What was the finding of the market?
fr_query: Quel a t le constat du march ?
en_summary: Marketing did a usability lab-test with a hundred people and found that users disliked the ugly look of current remote controls and the market segmentation includes different attitudes towards new functions. Users felt it hard to learn new functions and they zapped a lot. The channel switch was the most popular function while the power, volume and channel selections buttons were very relevant. The market was to be segmented to different groups and most users were between thirty-six and forty-five years old and young users had different tastes about the LCD compared to the old. The speech recognition features were welcomed by the second largest group, the young but which group they should targeted remained to be discussed. Marketing concluded that less important functions should be discarded and the device should be user friendly.
fr_summary: Le responsable marketing a effectu un test d'utilisabilit en laboratoire avec une centaine de personnes et a constat que les utilisateurs n'aimaient pas l'apparence laide des tlcommandes actuelles et que la segmentation du march comprend diffrentes attitudes envers les nouvelles fonctions. Les utilisateurs ont eu du mal  apprendre de nouvelles fonctions et ils ont beaucoup zapp. Le changement de chane tait la fonction la plus populaire tandis que les boutons d'alimentation, de volume et de slection de chane taient trs pertinents. Le march devait tre segment en diffrents groupes et la plupart des utilisateurs avaient entre trente-six et quarante-cinq ans et les jeunes utilisateurs avaient des gots diffrents  propos de l'cran LCD par rapport aux anciens. Les fonctionnalits de reconnaissance vocale ont t bien accueillies par le deuxime groupe le plus important, les jeunes, mais le groupe cible tait sceptique. Le responsable marketing a conclu que les fonctions moins importantes devaient tre supprimes et que l'appareil devait tre convivial.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about industrial components.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur les composants industriels.
en_summary: The industrial designer provided several options respectively for energy, material and interface. Among these options, the industrial designer preferred traditional battery, titanium and simple push buttons so that they would have enough money for speech recognition. After that, the user interface designer proposed an LCD display only for output, which might be taken into account. The group also talked about how to enable the users to find their controllers.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a propos plusieurs options respectivement pour l'nergie, le matriau et l'interface. Parmi ces options, le designer industriel a prfr la batterie traditionnelle, le titane et les boutons poussoirs simples afin d'avoir assez d'argent pour la reconnaissance vocale. Aprs cela, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a propos un cran LCD uniquement pour la sortie, ce qui pourrait tre pris en compte. Le groupe a galement parl de la faon de permettre aux utilisateurs de trouver leurs contrleurs.

en_query: What did the Project Manager elaborate on the members when discussing the materials of the television remote?
fr_query: Qu'a expliqu que le chef de projet aux membres lors de la discussion sur les matriaux de la tlcommande de tlvision ?
en_summary: The group talked about the material and they found it would be hard to balance the budget and the quality. In order to save the cost and ensure satisfying user experience, the Project Manager decided to choose high-quality recycled plastic as the material. But in terms of the battery, he would pay a lot to equip the remote with a cutting-edge lithium battery.
fr_summary: Le groupe a parl du matriel et a trouv qu'il serait difficile d'quilibrer le budget et la qualit. Afin de rduire les cots et d'assurer une exprience utilisateur satisfaisante, le chef de projet a dcid de choisir du plastique recycl de haute qualit comme matriau. Mais en termes de batterie, il paierait cher pour quiper la tlcommande d'une batterie au lithium de pointe.

en_query: What did the industrial designer recommend to do when discussing the product appearance?
fr_query: Qu'a recommand de faire le designer industriel lorsqu'il a discut de l'apparence du produit ?
en_summary: The industrial designer recommended to design several simple and perfect shapes so that users could choose the design they like. Also, they should make the colour of the LCD screen changeable to enable users to choose colours for each day depending on their mood.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a recommand de concevoir plusieurs formes simples et parfaites afin que les utilisateurs puissent choisir le design qui leur plat. En outre, ils devraient rendre la couleur de l'cran LCD modifiable pour permettre aux utilisateurs de choisir des couleurs pour chaque jour en fonction de leur humeur.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: It was the last meeting of the group and focused on detail design. First, the user interface designer displayed the appearance and the texture of the product with a working prototype. After that, the industrial designer gave some technical specifications on the product. In the product evaluation that included several criteria, the controller got an average score of two point one seven, which implied it was good. When it came to the quotation of product components, the original one was seventeen dot eight dollars, which was apparently over budget. After some discussions about battery and operations on the calculator, the group finally cut the cost down to under twelve dollars. Finally, they did some self-assessment and celebrated the completion of the project.
fr_summary: C'tait la dernire runion du groupe. Elle s'est concentre sur la conception dtaille. Tout d'abord, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a affich l'apparence et la texture du produit avec un prototype fonctionnel. Aprs cela, le designer industriel a donn quelques spcifications techniques sur le produit. Dans l'valuation du produit qui comprenait plusieurs critres, le contrleur a obtenu une note moyenne de deux virgule un sept, ce qui impliquait qu'il tait bon. En ce qui concerne le devis des composants du produit, celui d'origine tait de 17,80 dollars, ce qui tait apparemment suprieur au budget. Aprs quelques discussions sur la batterie et les oprations sur la calculatrice, le groupe a finalement rduit le cot  moins de 12 dollars. Enfin, ils ont fait une auto-valuation et clbr l'achvement du projet.

en_summary: Project Manager decided to use normal battery and no kinetic.The team would try to incorporate the joystick to replace the scroll chip. But if the advanced chips would be used still remained to be discussed. The shape of the design and the use of chips would depend on the LCD display but it should be small.

en_query: What is User Interface's presentation mainly about?
fr_query: De quoi parle principalement la prsentation de l'interface utilisateur ?
en_summary: User Interface talked about the method of including the buttons and the implementation of LCD screens. And he mentioned there are new developments in speech recognition systems as they are already being used on uh coffee machines; and since they're cheap, so he thinks they could use them now, as a small gimmick. As for mic and speaker, User Interface thinks that they are the same little hole things.

Et il a mentionn qu'il y avait de nouveaux dveloppements dans les systmes de reconnaissance vocale, car ils sont dj utiliss sur les machines  caf ; et comme ils sont bon march, il a pens qu'ils pourraient les utiliser maintenant, comme un petit gadget. En ce qui concerne le micro et le haut-parleur, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a pens qu'il s'agissait des mmes petits trous.

en_query: Why did Project Manager think of the advanced technology design when presenting the technical functions?
fr_query: Pourquoi le chef de projet a-t-il pens  la conception technologique avance lors de la prsentation des fonctions techniques ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer suggested the group could keep the design as simple and clear as possible because this would help them to upgrade their technology at a future point of time. Project Manager asked about the cost at this point, however, Industrial Designer had no idea about what each component cost. So Project Manager thought it should be considered because the price would increase if they were using more advanced technology.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a suggr au groupe de garder la conception aussi simple et claire que possible, car cela les aiderait  mettre  niveau leur technologie  un moment ultrieur. Le chef de projet a pos des questions sur le cot  ce stade, cependant, le designer industriel n'avait aucune ide du cot de chaque composant. Le chef de projet a donc pens qu'il fallait en tenir compte car le prix augmenterait s'il utilisait une technologie plus avance.

en_query: Summarize the group discussion about general requirements.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion de groupe sur les exigences gnrales.
en_summary: The group had a discussion about the target age group and they agreed to look at 15 to 35 year olds. Also, they decided to make it look simple, but still have those key buttons so it would be easy to use. Lastly, the group agreed to include one sort of menu button and voice recognition as an option.
fr_summary: Le groupe a eu une discussion sur le groupe d'ge cible et ils ont convenu de s'intresser aux 15  35 ans. En outre, ils ont dcid de la rendre simple, mais ont toujours ces boutons cls pour qu'elle soit facile  utiliser. Enfin, le groupe a convenu d'inclure une sorte de bouton de menu et de reconnaissance vocale en option.

en_query: What's the decision of remote feature design?
fr_query: Quelle a t la dcision de conception de fonctionnalits  distance ?
en_summary: Project Manager believed that it could not be heavy. Industrial Designer indicated that fewer and bigger buttons are better and should be bust-free, for instance, rubber could be used on it. Industrial Designer also suggested that when users push a button, they could hear some sort of bleep. User Interface suggested a LED on the corner and not too expensive material like plastic could be used. Marketing added that it should look nice for better sales and should work with as many as possible of existing products listed on their website. Industrial Designer also concluded that it should be battery-saving.
fr_summary: Le chef de projet pensait que cela ne pouvait pas tre lourd. Le designer industriel a indiqu qu'il tait prfrable d'avoir des boutons moins nombreux et plus gros et qu'ils devraient tre sans buste, par exemple, du caoutchouc pourrait tre utilis dessus. Le designer industriel a galement suggr que lorsque les utilisateurs appuieraient sur un bouton, ils puissent entendre une sorte de bip. Le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suggr une LED sur le coin et un matriau pas trop cher comme le plastique pourrait tre utilis. Le responsable marketing a ajout qu'il devrait tre beau pour de meilleures ventes et devrait fonctionner avec le plus grand nombre possible de produits existants rpertoris sur leur site Web. Le designer industriel a galement conclu qu'il devrait conomiser la batterie.

en_query: What does the group discuss on the final decision of the company sign?
fr_query: Qua dit le groupe sur la dcision finale du signe de l'entreprise ?
en_summary: They decide that they shall implement the feeling from our company into the remote so they have to implement a logo, a slogan or a sign. Industrial Designer thinks that to make it more recognisable, next to the logo they should have the slogan. And the project manager decided that the slogan from the company should be put on the back with a logo, and the logo also is also on the front when changing fronts.
fr_summary: Ils ont dcid d'implmenter le sentiment de notre entreprise dans la tlcommande, ils devaient donc implmenter un logo, un slogan ou un signe. Le designer industriel a pens que pour le rendre plus reconnaissable,  ct du logo, ils devraient avoir le slogan. Et le chef de projet a dcid que le slogan de l'entreprise devait tre mis au dos avec un logo, et le logo est galement sur le devant lors du changement de faade.

en_query: Summarize the Project Manager's perspective on the prototype.
fr_query: Rsumez le point de vue du chef de projet sur le prototype.
en_summary: The Project Manager thought the prototype was basically the same with the former one, and the thickness was not suitable for the target customers. Then the LCD screen might be covered when held by hands, so the users couldn't figure out what happened on the screen. Therefore from this perspective the screen was totally unusable, still needing marketing research.
fr_summary: Le chef de projet pensait que le prototype tait fondamentalement le mme que l'ancien et que l'paisseur n'tait pas adapte aux clients cibles. Ensuite, l'cran LCD peut tre couvert lorsqu'il est tenu par les mains, de sorte que les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas comprendre ce qui s'est pass sur l'cran. Par consquent, de ce point de vue, l'cran tait totalement inutilisable, ncessitant encore une tude marketing.

en_query: Which color was considered more appropriate by team members when discussing the desired features of remote control?
fr_query: Quelle couleur a t considre comme la plus approprie par les membres de l'quipe lors de la discussion des fonctionnalits souhaites de la tlcommande ?
en_summary: They argue that the TV remote should not be too colorful and must match the color of the TV they sell. They admit that no color is acceptable to everyone. It's something they think people generally don't like bright colors. It's their intention to make the TV remote in black or gray or silver.
fr_summary: Ils ont soutenu que la tlcommande du tlviseur ne devait pas tre trop colore et devait correspondre  la couleur du tlviseur qu'ils vendaient. Ils ont admis qu'aucune couleur n'tait acceptable pour tout le monde. Ils ont pens que les gens n'aimaient gnralement pas les couleurs vives. C'tait leur intention de rendre la tlcommande du tlviseur en noir ou gris ou argent.

en_query: What are the group's decisions on LCD screen, color and materials?
fr_query: Quelles ont t les dcisions du groupe sur l'cran LSD , la couleur et les matriaux ?
en_summary: As for the LCD screen, the Project Manager considers colored ones are a bit too expensive, so they can just do normal ones, and the shape of the control can be in a bridge shape. As for the materials, Industrial Designers think that a solid and strong appearance is necessary, and Marketing agrees that plastics don't create a strong touching feeling, and as a combination, they decide to have hard plastic for the front and then titanium for the back. As for colors, the group decides to use basic colors with some special patterns.
fr_summary: En ce qui concerne l'cran LCD, le chef de projet a considr que les couleurs taient un peu trop chres, et quil fallait donc des crans normaux, avec peut tre une forme de pont. En ce qui concerne les matriaux, les designers industriels ont pens qu'une apparence solide et solide tait ncessaire, et le responsable marketing a convenu que les plastiques ne craient pas une forte sensation de toucher, et en combinaison, ils ont dcid d'avoir du plastique dur pour le devant et ensuite du titane pour le retour. Quant aux couleurs, le groupe a dcid d'utiliser des couleurs de base avec quelques motifs spciaux.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: Firstly, User Interface suggested trendy and one-color cases, good icons on the big buttons since they would be recognizable and excite the young people. Secondly, Industrial Designer introduced that young people favored soft materials and primary colors, but trendy design on the button and the use of LCD display would increase cost since the budget had always been a big problem. Moreover, the team would aim at the younger market based on the decision of the former meeting and agreed that to make the device more profitable they should sell the product for longer than one year. The team also discussed the button function of the remote control but they had not come to an agreement. Lastly, Project Manager decided on a normal battery and no kinetic to control the budget.
fr_summary: Tout d'abord, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suggr des tuis  la mode et unicolores, de bonnes icnes sur les gros boutons car ils seraient reconnaissables et exciteraient les jeunes. Deuximement, le designer industriel a expliqu que les jeunes prfraient les matriaux souples et les couleurs primaires, mais que le design tendance sur le bouton et l'utilisation d'un cran LCD augmenteraient les cots car le budget avait toujours t un gros problme. De plus, l'quipe visait le march plus jeune sur la base de la dcision de la runion prcdente et a convenu que pour rendre l'appareil plus rentable, ils devraient vendre le produit pendant plus d'un an. L'quipe a galement discut de la fonction des boutons de la tlcommande, mais ils n'taient pas parvenus  un accord. Enfin, le chef de projet a opt pour une batterie normale et aucune cintique pour contrler le budget.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about project finance.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur le financement du projet.
en_summary: The production cost was 12.5 Euros. So, the group decided to have one simple battery, no kinetic energy, no solar, one advanced chip, one sample speaker, one single-curved surface which can be folded, push-buttons, the scroll wheel, the LCD display. And they decided to give up the sample sensor as well as the locator.
fr_summary: Le cot de production tait de 12,50 euros. Ainsi, le groupe a dcid d'avoir une batterie simple, pas d'nergie cintique, pas de solaire, une puce avance, un chantillon de haut-parleur, une surface  une seule courbe qui peut tre plie, des boutons-poussoirs, la molette de dfilement, l'cran LCD. Et ils ont dcid d'abandonner le capteur d'chantillon ainsi que le localisateur.

en_summary: Marketing thinks that if they don't have a bit of titanium between the two fronts, users may get problems with the LCD screen, like some dust in it  because people have always all kinds of filth between the mobile, when people exchange all the fronts, the control is open. And the group decides to have a bit of titanium in between, and with the curved edge.
fr_summary: Le marketing a pens que s'il n'y avait pas un peu de titane entre les deux fronts, les utilisateurs pourraient avoir des problmes avec l'cran LCD, comme de la poussire dedans  parce que les gens ont toujours toutes sortes de salets dans les tlphones mobiles, quand les gens changent tous les fronts, le contrle est ouvert. Et le groupe a dcid d'avoir un peu de titane entre les deux, et avec le bord incurv.

dialogue:
marketing: Or not. Uh. Oh there we go. Perfect. Okay. So this is me. Um basically I was looking through some marketing reports that we've got and we had a usability test where we were actually sort like watching a hundred people use T_V_ remotes and see what it is that they're using and then they filled out a questionnaire about what they like and what they don't about their general T_V_ remote control practices. Um pretty much through testing we were finding out that most of the time, everybody's used to using changing the channel, turning it on, using the volume, m the majority of the time that's all that's going on, the other functions happen, for some people they're important, but the primary uses are really really basic. Um and so big complicated remotes like one we saw in the last presentation are really not the general public's use, they're not using a lot of it, they don't need it, they even find it frustrating when there are all those buttons that they don't know what to do with. And um we also found out that uh fifty percent of our people, their the worst thing about a remote is how often they lose it. And then they can't find it in the room. So I think what we were talking about with a pager or something, will really come into play with a lot of these people. Um there's also a survey about what they liked about remotes,

en_query: Why did the Project Manager agree with Marketing when discussing his personal ideas towards the design?
fr_query: Pourquoi le chef de projet tait-il d'accord avec le responsable marketing lorsqu'il discutait de ses ides personnelles concernant la conception ?
en_summary: The Marketing proposed to use voice control on the remote and according to his research, three quarters of people under 35 are in favour of voice control. At the same time, in order to keep the remote not so easy to be lost as its counterparts of other brands, voice control would be an essential technique. For those two reasons, the Marketing persuaded the Project Manager to target their consumers as the youth.
fr_summary: Le responsable marketing a propos d'utiliser la commande vocale sur la tlcommande et selon ses recherches, les trois quarts des personnes de moins de 35 ans sont favorables  la commande vocale. De plus, afin de garder la tlcommande moins facile  perdre que ses homologues d'autres marques, la commande vocale serait une technique essentielle. Pour ces deux raisons, le responsable marketing a persuad le chef de projet de cibler ses consommateurs en tant que jeunes.

en_query: What did the group think of the wood case when discussing the key remote control concepts?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le groupe de la caisse en bois lors de la discussion des concepts cls de la tlcommande ?
en_summary: User Interface thought it would be hard to keep the remote control small with a wood case. Industrial Designer thought the thin wood remote would be easy to break. Project Manager thought given that they were looking at more spongy material preferences, rubber or plastic would be more practical. Also, the group thought that wood was not cleanable, so they decided not to use a wood case for the remote control.
fr_summary: Le concepteur de linterface utilisateur a pens qu'il serait difficile de garder la tlcommande petite avec un botier en bois. Le designer industriel a considr que la tlcommande en bois fin serait facile  casser. Le chef de projet a dit qu'tant donn qu'ils recherchaient des prfrences de matriaux plus spongieux, le caoutchouc ou le plastique serait plus pratique. De plus, le groupe a pens que le bois n'tait pas nettoyable, ils ont donc dcid de ne pas utiliser de botier en bois pour la tlcommande.

en_query: What did the group think of the pros and cons of having an LCD screen on top of the remote?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le groupe des avantages et des inconvnients d'avoir un cran LCD au-dessus de la tlcommande ?
en_summary: Marketing suggested putting a small LCD screen on top of the remote but Industrial Designer against it because a remote should be started with the power button and User Interface thought it would be unnatural to put the LCD on the top. Then, Marketing mentioned that would be where users' handball might be. So Industrial Designer thought they could put the whole interface a bit down so there would be room for the interface.

Ensuite, le responsable marketing a mentionn que ce serait l que pourrait se trouver la boule manuelle. Alors le designer industriel a pens qu'ils pourraient rduire un peu toute l'interface pour qu'il y ait de la place pour l'interface.

en_query: Why did the Industrial Designer disagree to replace the titanium when discussing product cost and quotation?
fr_query: Pourquoi le designer industriel n'a-t-il pas accept de remplacer le titane lors de la discussion du cot du produit et du devis ?
en_summary: The Industrial Designer suggested that the titanium provided the tough look and the strong cover to protect the product. Besides, the older customers would like it much more because it fit their taste. So the titanium was important and shouldn't be replacing by titanium-like plastic or saving the LCD screen but dumping the titanium.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a suggr que le titane offrait l'aspect robuste et la couverture solide pour protger le produit. De plus, les clients plus gs l'apprcieraient beaucoup plus car il correspondait  leurs gots. Le titane tait donc important et ne devrait pas tre remplac par du plastique semblable au titane, ou encore sauver l'cran LCD mais abandonner le titane.

en_query: What did the Project Manager think about their presentation contents when reflecting on their meetings and project progress?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le chef de projet du contenu de sa prsentation lorsqu'il a rflchi  ses runions et  l'avancement du projet ?
en_summary: The Project Manager planned to include their project process in the presentation. In addition, he thought it would be an interesting experiment to carry out an open mic presentation in which the team members could get out of the roles and share their satisfaction of the room and their creativity freely.
fr_summary: Le gestionnaire de projet a prvu d'inclure son processus de projet dans la prsentation. De plus, il a pens que ce serait une exprience intressante de raliser une prsentation  micro ouvert dans laquelle les membres de l'quipe pourraient sortir des rles et partager librement leur satisfaction de la salle et leur crativit.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The meeting was mainly about the exchange of the preliminary ideas about a new TV remote control project. They first got used to the whiteboard and drew some animals with it. Project manager wanted to sell this remote control for 25 Euro and expected profit will be around fifty million Euro. Afterwards the team raised different opinions about function and fashion features of the new remote controls . In particular, they emphasized the fashion of the remote control should be combined with the function, and the design of the battery should be original and not far away from the conventional design.
fr_summary: La runion portait principalement sur l'change d'ides prliminaires sur un nouveau projet de tlcommande TV. Ils se sont d'abord habitus au tableau blanc et ont dessin des animaux avec. Le chef de projet voulait vendre cette tlcommande pour 25 euros pour un bnfice attendu d'environ cinquante millions d'euros. Par la suite, l'quipe a mis des opinions diffrentes sur la fonction et les caractristiques de mode des nouvelles tlcommandes. En particulier, ils ont soulign que la mode de la tlcommande devait tre combine avec la fonction, et que la conception de la batterie devait tre originale et non loin de la conception conventionnelle.

en_query: Summarize the presentation on functional requirements.
fr_query: Rsumez la prsentation sur les exigences fonctionnelles.
en_summary: Marketing presented on functional requirements, found that 75% of users thought most remote controls were ugly and it might be sensible to make a beeping device because 50% of users lost their controls in the room. Marketing also suggested designing a remote that would be easy to pick up and use. Lastly, Marketing suggested targeting a younger group market, and most young people were keen on LCD and speech recognition.
fr_summary: Le responsable marketing a prsent les exigences fonctionnelles et a rvl que 75 % des utilisateurs pensent que la plupart des tlcommandes sont laides et qu'il pourrait tre judicieux de fabriquer un appareil qui met un bip car 50 % des utilisateurs perdent leur tlcommande. Le responsable marketing a galement suggr de concevoir une tlcommande facile  prendre en main et  utiliser. Enfin, le responsable marketing a suggr de cibler un march de groupe plus jeune, et la plupart des jeunes taient friands de l'cran LCD et de la reconnaissance vocale.

en_query: Summarize the presentation on evaluation criteria.
fr_query: Rsumez la prsentation sur les critres d'valuation.
en_summary: The group gave a high score in terms of a fashion look, the ease of use, the locator, the scroll wheel, the LCD screen as well as the voice recognition technology. They also calculated the average overall score was six point five. The group agreed that the assessment was very good.
fr_summary: Le groupe a donn une note leve en termes de look tendance, de facilit d'utilisation, de localisateur, de molette de dfilement, d'cran LCD ainsi que de technologie de reconnaissance vocale. Ils ont galement calcul que le score global moyen tait de six virgule cinq. Le groupe a convenu que l'valuation tait trs bonne.

en_query: What did the group discuss about the design goal of the remote control?
fr_query: De quoi le groupe a-t-il discut concernant l'objectif de conception de la tlcommande ?
en_summary: They wanted it to be original, trendy, user-friendly, durable, creative and characteristic, so it can be very intuitive that people could use the product. In addition, the price, cost and expected profit of the remote control were also determined. In the part of creativity, they pointed out that creativity should have its own characteristics and ensure its fashion without affecting its functionality, so as to truly "introduce fashion into electronics". In terms of function, it is necessary to simplify the switch and guarantee function.
fr_summary: Ils voulaient qu'elle soit originale, tendance, conviviale, durable, crative et caractristique, de sorte qu'elle puisse tre trs intuitive que les gens puissent utiliser le produit. En outre, le prix, le cot et le bnfice attendu de la tlcommande ont galement t dtermins. Ils ont soulign que la crativit devait avoir ses propres caractristiques et assurer sa mode sans affecter sa fonctionnalit, afin de vritablement  introduire la mode dans l'lectronique . En termes de fonction, il est ncessaire de simplifier la fonction de commutation et de garantie.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: This meeting was about technical design. Firstly, the group had three presentations on remote components, user interface and market trends. They presented remote control features including the circuit board, the chip, the kinetic energy, the interface mechanism of operation, the scroll wheel to be added as well as the LCD and spinning innovation. Then, the group had a discussion about the key remote concepts. They decided to have a LCD display with a spinning wheel. They would not have hand dynamos, instead, they would have a wind dynamo. And they would keep the kinetic energy as an option and look at more spongy material preferences with rubber or plastic.
fr_summary: Cette runion portait sur la conception technique. Tout d'abord, le groupe a eu trois prsentations sur les composants de la tlcommande, l'interface utilisateur et les tendances du march. Ils ont prsent les fonctionnalits de la tlcommande, notamment le circuit imprim, la puce, l'nergie cintique, le mcanisme d'interface de fonctionnement, la molette de dfilement  ajouter ainsi que l'innovation LCD et la rotation. Ensuite, le groupe a eu une discussion sur les concepts cls de la tlcommande. Ils ont dcid d'avoir un cran LCD avec une roue qui tourne. Ils n'auraient pas de dynamos manuelles, mais plutt une dynamo olienne. Et ils garderaient l'nergie cintique en option et envisageraient des prfrences de matriaux plus spongieux avec du caoutchouc ou du plastique.

fr_query: Pourquoi les camarades du groupe n'taient-ils pas d'accord avec le designer industriel lorsqu'ils ont discut de la perte de leurs critres d'valuation ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer thought they lost the locator while keeping other features. But Project Manager responded that they were going to have a beeper. User Interface supplemented that it was not like a sample speaker, but it would beep so they still had the locator.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel pensait avoir perdu le localisateur tout en conservant d'autres fonctionnalits. Mais le chef de projet a rpondu qu'ils allaient avoir un bipeur. Le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a ajout que ce n'tait pas comme un chantillon de haut-parleur, mais qu'il mettait un bip pour qu'ils aient toujours le localisateur.

en_query: What did the marketing learn about the functions that users often used when discussing user requirements?
fr_query: Qu'a appris le responsable marketing sur les fonctions que les utilisateurs utilisent souvent lorsqu'ils discutent des besoins des utilisateurs ?
en_summary: After conducting a survey, the marketing found power button was not used often because users used it only once per session while the channel selection was very often used which made it quite important. Volume was not often used but people wanted to have control on volume and that made sense. What much less often used was the settings, such as audio settings, screen settings, even teletext and channel settings.
fr_summary: Aprs avoir men une enqute, le responsable marketing a constat que le bouton d'alimentation n'tait pas souvent utilis car les utilisateurs ne l'utilisaient qu'une seule fois par session alors que la slection de chane tait trs souvent utilise, ce qui le rendait assez important. Le volume n'tait pas souvent utilis, mais les gens voulaient contrler le volume et cela avait du sens. Ce qui tait beaucoup moins souvent utilis, ce sont les paramtres, tels que les paramtres audio, les paramtres d'cran, mme les paramtres de tltexte et de chane.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about trend watching and appearance design.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur l'observation des tendances et la conception de l'apparence.
en_summary: The marketing put forward three noteworthy aspects in trends. First and foremost, people loved fancy things that they could be identified with. The second point was that as a remote control it had to be technologically innovative. Thirdly, being easy to use was also necessary. From a broader perspective, fruit and vegetables were in fashion this year and being spongy was also popular. Thus, contrary to the industrial designer, the marketing thought rubber was more feasible in terms of sponginess. The group agreed that the product should resemble fruit and vegetable in shape and colour but the specific design was not decided.
fr_summary: Le responsable marketing a mis en avant trois aspects notables dans les tendances. D'abord et avant tout, les gens aimaient les choses fantaisistes auxquelles ils pouvaient s'identifier. Le deuxime point tait qu'en tant que tlcommande, elle devait tre technologiquement innovante. Troisimement, tre facile  utiliser tait galement ncessaire. D'un point de vue plus large, les fruits et lgumes taient  la mode cette anne et le fait d'tre spongieux tait galement populaire. Ainsi, contrairement au designer industriel, le marketing pensait que le caoutchouc tait plus ralisable en termes de spongiosit. Le groupe a convenu que le produit devait ressembler aux fruits et lgumes en termes de forme et de couleur, mais la conception spcifique n'a pas t dcide.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about product evaluation.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur l'valuation des produits.
en_summary: The marketing thought they needed to evaluate whether it made sense to do the project and whether the product could fulfil their requirement. So the group started to judge the design on a scale of one to seven, one being true and seven being false. The criteria were fanciness, technology, robustness, usefulness, size and weight, colour and shape, and adaptiveness. The product got an average score of two point one seven, which implied it was good.
fr_summary: Le responsable marketing a pens qu'il devait valuer s'il tait logique de raliser le projet et si le produit pouvait rpondre  ses besoins. Le groupe a donc commenc  juger la conception sur une chelle de un  sept, un tant vrai et sept tant faux. Les critres taient la fantaisie, la technologie, la robustesse, l'utilit, la taille et le poids, la couleur et la forme, et l'adaptabilit. Le produit a obtenu une note moyenne de deux virgule un sept, ce qui impliquait qu'il tait bon.

en_query: Summarize the decision of the discussion about the design goal of the remote control.
fr_query: Rsumez la dcision de la discussion sur l'objectif de conception de la tlcommande.
en_summary: The group hoped that it can be applied to children, in particular to ensure their safety during use. Besides, it should be colourful and beautiful to attract the attention of children. In terms of function design, unnecessary functions and switches should be removed to enhance their applicability.
fr_summary: Le groupe a souhait qu'elle puisse s'appliquer aux enfants, notamment pour assurer leur scurit lors de l'utilisation. En outre, elle doit tre colore et belle pour attirer l'attention des enfants. En termes de conception, les fonctions et commutateurs inutiles doivent tre supprims pour amliorer leur applicabilit.

en_query: Why did the Marketing disagree with the Project Manager when talking about the touch screen under the limitation of the budget?
fr_query: Pourquoi le responsable marketing n'tait-il pas d'accord avec le chef de projet lorsqu'il parlait de l'cran tactile sous la limitation du budget ?
en_summary: When the group found that it was hard to balance between the cost and functions, the Project Manager proposed to give up the voice recognition and keep the touch screen. But according to Marketings research, even if the interviewees were not informed of the touch screen, they showed a great preference for voice recognition. So just for catering to popular tastes, the Marketing insisted that they should keep the voice recognition in any case.
fr_summary: Lorsque le groupe a constat qu'il tait difficile d'quilibrer le cot et les fonctionnalits, le chef de projet a propos de renoncer  la reconnaissance vocale et de conserver l'cran tactile. Mais selon les recherches marketing, mme si les interviews n'taient pas informs de l'cran tactile, ils ont montr une grande prfrence pour la reconnaissance vocale. Donc, juste pour rpondre aux gots populaires, le responsable marketing a insist pour qu'ils conservent la reconnaissance vocale dans tous les cas.

en_query: What did the team discuss about the use of advanced chips and LCD display?
fr_query: Qua dit l'quipe  propos de l'utilisation de puces avances et d'un cran LCD ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer introduced the use of LCD display would highly increase the cost. Project Manager agreed that the LCD was easy when using the scroll buttons and could see the number. But Project Manager argued that young people were less likely to have their own room to afford a LCD TV and decided not to choose the advanced ones.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a introduit  la fois des puces simples et des puces avances pouvant tre utilises. Mais cela ncessiterait l'utilisation d'un cran LCD, ce qui augmenterait fortement le cot. Le chef de projet a convenu que l'cran LCD tait facile  utiliser avec les boutons de dfilement et pouvait voir le numro. Mais le chef de projet a fait valoir que les jeunes taient moins susceptibles d'avoir leur propre chambre pour s'offrir un tlviseur LCD et a dcid de ne pas choisir les plus avancs.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: Project Manager introduced the overall plan for designing the product that has to be original, trendy and user-friendly to the team and asked each team member to draw a painting. The team shared their experiences with remote control devices and gave ideas about the new remote control product features. They decided that the new device should be good-looking, easy to use and cost saving.
fr_summary: Le chef de projet a prsent le plan global de conception du produit qui devait tre original, tendance et convivial pour l'quipe et a demand  chaque membre de l'quipe de dessiner une peinture. L'quipe a partag ses expriences avec les appareils de contrle  distance et a donn des ides sur les nouvelles fonctionnalits du produit de contrle  distance. Ils ont dcid que le nouvel appareil devait tre beau, facile  utiliser et conomique.

fr_query: Pourquoi le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a-t-il pens qu'il devrait utiliser plus de boutons qu'actuellement lors de la discussion sur la conception de la fonction technique ?
en_summary: Compared with the current manufacturer design, User Interface mentioned that they should reduce the option to control the DVD. And according to the new requirements, they need to control the maximum number of buttons within ten.
fr_summary: Par rapport  la conception actuelle du fabricant, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a mentionn qu'il fallait rduire l'option de contrle du DVD. Et selon les nouvelles exigences, il faudrait restreindre le nombre maximum de boutons  dix.

en_summary: This meeting is about some final decisions on the design of the remote control. It started with presentations on the conceptual design from Marketing, Industrial Designer, and User Interface, and had a discussion on the decisions about the control. The Project Manager put a file in his folder to place the kind of decisions they should take.
fr_summary: Cette runion portait sur quelques dcisions finales sur la conception de la tlcommande. Cela a commenc par des prsentations sur le design conceptuel du responsable marketing, du designer industriel et du concepteur de l'interface utilisateur, avec une discussion sur les dcisions concernant le contrle. Le chef de projet a mis un fichier dans son dossier pour y placer le type de dcisions qu'il devait prendre.

en_query: What did Project Manager think of the manual design when discussing the ease of use?

en_summary: Project Manager thought the beeping device was not easy to learn but Industrial Marketing thought the design expert should put more time on the ease of use design than a manual because they didn't have much time. While Project Manager mentioned that they were a design team, they could find some writers to make a manual point which could help maintain consistency with the older remote manual for the users.
